description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Tabs' that renders a tablist with keyboard navigation support. It handles styling based on props and manages active tab state through props. The file also includes a helper function for class name concatenation.

methods.name: cx(...parts)
methods.description: Helper function to concatenate class names based on conditional logic.

methods.name: Tabs({ variant = "underline", tabs, activeKey, onChange })
methods.description: React component rendering a tabbed navigation UI with accessibility features.

ctags.name: Tabs
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Tabs({ variant = "underline", tabs, activeKey, onChange }) {$/
